title: Discord Portal
subtitle: Connections across servers
description: Discord Portal is a Discord bot that enables cross-server communication by linking channels together. A channel can serve as an entrypoint to a Portal, and any message sent in that channel will be sent to all other channels linked to the Portal. This allows for a seamless experience for users, as they can communicate with people from other servers without having to leave their own.
short_description: A Discord bot that enables cross-server communication by linking channels together.
